summary: After the Civil War, a returning Confederate veteran must reclaim his Arizona land and homestead from the Yankee carpetbaggers who illegally occupy it.
cast: Tom Selleck|Suzy Amis|Rachel Duncan|Haley Joel Osment|Keith Carradine|David Carradine|Tracey Needham|Chris Stacy|Harry Carey Jr.|Patrick Kilpatrick|Eugene Osment|Denis Forest|David Dukes|Lumi Cavazos|Raymond Cruz|Fredrick Lopez|Rosalia De Aragon|Ramon Frank|Paul Blott|Rex Linn|R.A. Hilder|John Howard Young|Von Engels|J.D. Garfield|Héctor Mercado|Rudy Ugland|Tim Carroll|Billy Lockwood
title: Después de una guerra
